sources.title: 1942 Kleine Residenz ( Fritz Odemar, Lil Dagover, Johannes Riemann, Gustav Waldau, Eric Ode, Paul Wagner, Elise Aulinger, Josef Eichheim)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1942. Kleine Residenz.  U.a mit Lil Dagover und Johannes Riemann

metadata.Plot: The film is full of ironic statements and double meanings which can be taken to apply to Hitler's fascist regime: Especially a scene in which an informer (Denunziant) is branded as an especially low creature. All this makes the film very enjoyable today.
metadata.Actors: Walter Buhse, Willem Holsboer, Wastl Witt
